full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 UNIT STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 FILE NO.: A17 181 791 TC/245/SIO DATE: June 10, 1970 RETURN IN THE ENCLOSED ENVELOPE Miss Betty Pei-Ing Mao A COPY OF THIS LETTER SIGNED BY 720 South San Rafael THE U.S.PUBLIC HEALTH DOCTOR. Pasadena, California 91105 Thomas Waterhouse, Esquire 99 So. Lake Ave., Suite 570 Pasadena, California 91101 MEDICAL AND IMMIGRATION EXAMINATION APPOINTMENT INSTRUCTIONS FOR MEDICAL EXAMINATION A MEDICAL EXAMINATION IS NECESSARY AS PART OF YOUR APPLICATION FOR ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO THAT OF A PERMANENT RESIDENT. AN APPOINTMENT HAS BEEN MADE FOR YOU TO BE EXAMINED BY A DOCTOR OF THE U.S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE AT: ADDRESS: U.S.Public Health Service DATE: Friday, July 24, 1970 825 So. Beacon Street San Pedro, California 90731 TIME: 2:30 PM IF YOU DO NOT SPEAK ENGLISH, YOU SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY A PERSON OF YOUR OWN SEX WHO CAN ACT AS INTERPRETER. BRING WITH YOU THIS LETTER, THE TWO ATTACHED COPIES, AND THE FOLLOWING TO THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE FACILITY MENTIONED ABOVE: 1. X-RAY FILM (14" x 17") OF YOUR CHEST. FILM MUST NOT BE MORE THAN 30 DAYS OLD AND INTERPRETED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN. 2. SEROLOGY REPORT. SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS MUST NOT BE MORE THAN 30 DAYS OLD. THIS X-RAY AND TEST MUST BE ACCOMPLISHED BY A LICENSED PHYSICIAN OR A STATE OR LOCAL HEALTH DEPARTMENT APPROVED LAB- ORATORY. IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A PERSONAL PHYSICIAN, YOU MAY WISH TO TELEPHONE YOUR STATE OR LOCAL HEALTH DEPARTMENT FOR THE NAME OF AN APPROVED LABORATORY THAT MAY BE ABLE TO PERFORM THE X-RAY AND TEST REQUIRED. COPY TO U.S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE PLEASE OBTAIN THE APPLICANT'S SIGNATURE IN THE SPACE PROVIDED AND MEDICALLY EXAMINE HIM FOR ELIGIBILITY FOR ADJUST- MENT OF STATUS. IF THE APPLICANT IS FREE OF DEFECTS, DISEASES OR DISABILITIES LISTED IN SECTION 212 (a) OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATIONALITY ACT, A COPY OF THIS LETTER APPROPRIATELY ENDORSED AND RETURNED TO THIS OFFICE, WILL SERVE AS THE MED- ICAI, REPORT; OTHERWISE A FULL MEDICAL CERTIFICATE WILL BE REQUIRED. DISTRICT DIRECTOR I CERTIFY THAT THE ATTACHED X-RAY AND SEROLOGY REPORT (BLOOD TEST) RELATE TO ME. SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT: PENALTY: THE LAW PROVIDES SEVERE PENALTIES FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING X Betty naa A MATERIAL FACT OR USING ANY FALSE DOCUMENTS IN CONNECTION WITH THIS APPLICATION. MY EXAMINATION INCLUDING X-RAY, BLOOD SEROLOGICAL AND OTHER REPORTS, WHEN NEEDED, SHOW THE APPLICANT TO BE FREE OF ANY DEFECTS, DISEASES OR DISABILITIES LISTED IN SECTION 212 (a) OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATIONALITY ACT AS AMENDED. SIGNATURE OF U.S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE OFFICER DATE TITLE Charles Buhraw mn CLASS C SYPHILIS-LATE LATENT- ADEQUATELY TREATED AUG 2 71970 FORM I - 486 A U. S. Public Health Service Class AUG 271970 (REV. 10-15-69) Outpatient Clinic 825 South Beacon St. San Pedro, California 90731
